s1.title: The usual Cocoon Developer profile
s1.p: As a Cocoon developer (someone who develops components for Cocoon), you need of course everything you have to know as a Cocoon user. In addition you should have a basic understanding of the following technologies. Again, this knowledge is not specific to Cocoon; it can be used for building web applications with different frameworks as well.
